Question: Bubble Sort
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Recognize it’s O(n²) & avoid for large input

Question: Selection Sort
Beginner Approach: Find minimum & put at right place
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Use selection when swaps must be minimized

Question: Insertion Sort
Beginner Approach: Shift elements and insert in sorted position
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Use insertion for nearly sorted arrays

Question: Merge Sort
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: O(n log n) efficient stable sort

Question: Quick Sort
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Randomized pivot → average O(n log n)

Question: Bucket / Radix Sort
Optimized / Pattern-Based Approach: Great for floating values / large numbers
